docs.title: Lab Equipment Booking
docs.text:
Welcome to the lab equipment booking system.

Browse our available equipment below — click on any item to view details and download files.

Cobalt Traffic Controller EVO Radar Flir TrafiSense AI Four-legged Robot Spot Husky A300 Mikado Soundcam Neousys NRU-220S Series Parrot ANAFI Ai Traction Plus Motion Simulator Platform Virtual Reality SlimX-13

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Welcome to the EMRC Lab for Smart Mobility Management and Operation!

This lab focuses on advancing technologies for smart mobility through research and development. Below is an overview of our workflow and objectives:

docs.title: Objectives
docs.text:
1. Detect and Collect: Detect and collect data from various sources.
  2. Implement and Anticipate: Assess the impact of new autonomous technologies.
  3. Test and Act: Develop strategies based on performance evaluations.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Cobalt Traffic Controller is an advanced system used for real-time traffic monitoring and control.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The EVO Radar system provides high-resolution radar imaging for autonomous navigation and obstacle detection.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Flir TrafiSense AI is a smart sensing solution for intelligent transportation systems.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Four-legged Robot Spot is a versatile robotic platform designed for research, exploration, and lab automation.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Husky A300 is a rugged mobile robot platform ideal for lab environments, indoor testing, and autonomous navigation experiments.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Mikado Soundcam is a sound visualization tool that detects and visualizes noise sources in real time.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Neousys NRU-220S Series is a powerful edge computing device optimized for AI-based robotics and machine vision applications.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Parrot ANAFI Ai is a lightweight drone with built-in artificial intelligence for autonomous flight and aerial data capture.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Traction Plus Motion Simulator Platform is used for vehicle dynamics simulation and driver training in controlled conditions.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: The Virtual Reality SlimX-13 offers immersive VR experiences for training, simulation, and human-robot interaction studies.
